LanguageData.BiocodedStealChancePercentExplanation:
Note: This only matters if biocoded weapons retain a good portion of their value. In addition, this rolls for each biocoded weapon in range (12 tile radius), for each raider.
Assume 3 raiders break into a storeroom housing 2 biocoded weapons worth 999 Silver each, and 10 stacks of 500 Silver. In this scenario, the chance they will take at least one biocoded weapon will be: 1 - (1 - {0})^(3 + 2) = {1}%
